ReviewList.Text: When was physics ever easy, well it's not. This book has some helpful examples. Look near the end of the examples to make sense of the formulas. The book has enough problem solutions to help get on the right track and lots of problems to try in each chapter. This Hardback edition covers 32 chapters, wow, lots of information and many chances to beat that stupid head of yours against the wall trying to understand the subject. Hint: better to try the problems than to read and hope to understand, because I learned more by "doing."

This product arrived in near new condition with just some shelf wear, however the wileyplus code that id supposed to come with a new book was not there. The only reason I bought this book instead of borrowing a friends to use was so that I wouldn't have to purchase the wileyplus code for another $95 dollars.  I am very unsatisfied with this purchase and would advise you to buy your "new" book elsewhere.

I love the illustrations and the way the concepts are written out. Especially the end of the chapter review. I think the problems get a bit more complex for their purpose. The book should show how one manipulates and combines equations together to solve for other variables. Not just expect students to figure it out. Not everyone is a math and physics majors.
I took a summer physics 1 course and wanted to buy a cheaper version of the recommended book. This book was perfect! It didn't have any writings inside and it look like it was new.
This book really help me with the class. I have no issues with class at all.I will encourage all to used this book when taking this class. It contained all the materials necessary
This book is pretty well written and really help you understand the materials better. This book is pretty well organized and very easy to follow
Everything went as planed. I ordered the book and got it on time and in the expected condition it was said to be.
Received item just as described & in noted time frame.  Thank you!

This is a book about physics.  I don't really like it since the examples are somewhat poor and the concepts aren't explained as well as I would like.  However, cramster fills the gaps and it's required for the course so what can I do?
This book did not come with the WileyPLUS code. Vendor doesn't reply to messages either. Do not buy if code is necessary!
it came just as the description said, was extremely fast i wasn't even expecting the books to get to me so soon
Item was a book that came in 2 days in a cushioned package and was just as it was described. very pleased
Product arrived within 24 hours of placing my order and was in great condition as advertised. This product definitely saved me money as my college campus bookstore was way more.
i am a junior in college and i have ordered books offline every semester for the past few years. this was by far the smoothest transaction ive ever had.
The physics book arrived very quickly and it was in good shape for being used and the price was reasonable.
Physics vol. 1 is exactly what I was looking for and I am really glad I have it now.
I prefer new books. The campus bookstore is selling this identical book for $135.10. By buying it from Amazon I saved $33.62, saving 25%!
